findings.message: Plan initializes showExpected from isManager only once via useState; if user resolves after first render, managers can incorrectly start in blind mode. Should handle with sync/reset strategy tied to auth readiness.
Same one-time initialization risk for showKeycardExpected; managers may not get immediate expected-keycard visibility if auth state arrives after mount.
Task body says Confidence: 90% while composite is 80% and task summary is 80%. Internal inconsistency.
Already at 90% contradicts stated composite confidence of 80% for TASK-03.
raises Impact to 80% is a no-op because Impact is already 80% in TASK-02.
Why: TBD remains unset in outcome contract.
